channel.title: Age of Empires Online launched
channel.description:
http://www.ageofempiresonline.com
If you plan to play, get on the realm/server called "Marathon", that's where i reside.
My gamertag is Yohanu
Have fun!

item.title: Age of Empires Online launched
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

item.description:

I want to play but I need a key and it’s complete Bull.
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure you don’t need one anymore. I didn’t need one.[/quote]

Last night I tried it and it said I needed a key.

[quote=“Frell, post:30, topic:410484”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=511768.msg3717065#msg3717065 date=1313706614]
I want to play but I need a key and it’s complete Bull.
[/quote]
lol its launched you dont need one

Ok, I hate this game. Too much boring shit and it is wayy too cartoony for me, and they bug me about premium too much.[/quote]

Too Cartoony. That’s the phrase I was looking for.

item.title: Age of Empires Online launched
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:17, topic:410484”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=511768.msg3714123#msg3714123 date=1313529232]

Why not play league of legends? It has like 15 million players…

AoE is MUCH better in my opinion. You can build anywhere and use strategy when you are attacking another army (split em and attack from both sides)

I think ensemble studios did a better job with AoE. The current website looks like a kids game. The AoE3 one was much more professional.
[/quote]
You disappoint me. I can see where you’re coming from about the graphics, but it really makes me mad.

This game right now is taking game artists by storm, because they appreciate the art style and something like this is very very difficult to pull off and remain consistent in stylization. Its like people who think the people who made WoW were lazy, you know those textures take days-weeks to paint right?[/quote]

I know, but the images on the website look like something out of a veggie tales video. It’s childish. I liked the AoE3 Professional looking graphics as opposed to the kid-like graphics on the website. I know, it takes a long time to create those graphics but I don’t like them.

Read full topic

item.title: Age of Empires Online launched
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:17, topic:410484”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=511768.msg3714123#msg3714123 date=1313529232]

Why not play league of legends? It has like 15 million players…

AoE is MUCH better in my opinion. You can build anywhere and use strategy when you are attacking another army (split em and attack from both sides)

I think ensemble studios did a better job with AoE. The current website looks like a kids game. The AoE3 one was much more professional.
[/quote]
You disappoint me. I can see where you’re coming from about the graphics, but it really makes me mad.

This game right now is taking game artists by storm, because they appreciate the art style and something like this is very very difficult to pull off and remain consistent in stylization. Its like people who think the people who made WoW were lazy, you know those textures take days-weeks to paint right?[/quote]

Frell, I definitely respect your point of view of this. I’m, by no means, a graphic’s artist, you’re someone who has plenty of experience. I’m not very fond of their graphics. I’m sure it takes plenty of time to do. However, I suppose a lot of people who have played previous version of the game, see this and it takes them back. This is like a different game to them, and appeals to a different audience.

Read full topic

I think ensemble studios did a better job with AoE. The current website looks like a kids game. The AoE3 one was much more professional.[/quote]

item.title: Age of Empires Online launched
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

I have not played this game, so obviously my observations and thoughts might be a little off from what I’ve seen on gameplay.

It looks like nothing new, except shittier graphics. This is how my ranking goes:

Age of Empires 1 = 7/10 ~~ Pretty good to start with, addicting, things could be improved though.
Age of Empires 2 = 10/10 ~~ Insanely addicting, couldn’t get enough of it for awhile.
Age of Empires 3 = 4/10 ~~ Just didn’t feel like Age of Empires to me.
Age of Mythology = 7/10 ~~ Very good, Things from temples were way too overpowered though, thus the game got boring.
Age of Empires Online? = 5/10 ~~ I haven’t played the game, but since it has the same concept as AOE2 I have to put it up there a little bit. It looks like much is the same though, but now it’s “online”, but AOE2 had that lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Age of Empires Online launched
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:10, topic:410484”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=511768.msg3714048#msg3714048 date=1313526915]
Why not play league of legends? It has like 15 million players…
[/quote]

AoE is MUCH better in my opinion. You can build anywhere and use strategy when you are attacking another army (split em and attack from both sides)

I think ensemble studios did a better job with AoE. The current website looks like a kids game. The AoE3 one was much more professional.[/quote]Don’t let the graphics deceive you, the gameplay is as solid as ever. The animations make up for the visual change as many of them are really funny. Take the caravans for example, the egyptian one is a camel chasing a waterskin stuck to a pole from his back, and the greek one is a donkey chasing a carrot in the same manner.

Read full topic
